label: Descriptive List of Free Negroes Belonging to City Engine No. 10 [Copy 2]
description: List of volunteer firefighters of city engine number 10, including their names, ages, description, occupation, and residence. Donated to the Charleston Museum by Charles Pequette, 1925

metadata.label: Description
metadata.value: List of volunteer firefighters of city engine number 10, including their names, ages, description, occupation, and residence. Donated to the Charleston Museum by Charles Pequette, 1925
